is an old health spa, the first establishments being built in 1819. In 1839 was declared a spa. The mineral waters of
are used in the treatment of a wide range of diseases. They are also bottled for common use.The park of

, with a surface of over 20 ha, is a dendrological park with many rare species of trees, the most important being the plane (Platanus).
